summary: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.
cast: Bruce Allpress|Geraldine Brophy|Eddie Campbell|Ben Chaplin|Peter Corrigan|Brian Cox|Carl Dixon|Alex Etel|Nathan Christopher Haase|Craig Hall|Ian Harcourt|Rex Hurst|William Johnson|Megan Katherine|Elliot Lawless|Lorraine McDonald|David Morrissey|Marshall Napier|Edward Newborn|Louis Owen Collins|Phil Peleton|William Russell|Erroll Shand|Joel Tobeck|Ben Van Lier|Emily Watson|Priyanka Xi|Sid|Ralph|Brennan Bailey|Charlie Bleakley|Nic Gorman|Winham Hammond|Jason Hood|Paul Kingdom|Alan Marsh|Walter McGinnis|Carlton McRae|Jonny Moffatt|Jay Ocampo|Russell Raethel|Lewis Rowe|Matthew Saville|Adam Smith|James Start|Jodie Taylor
title: Mi monstruo y yo
